thread.title: Knocker
thread.title_full: The Shower Doctor Ltd reviewed by Knocker

author: Knocker
title: Knocker
text:
The supplied shower cartridge was oversized by one half of a mm and would not fit in the shower unit. Rectifications had to be carried out to the body of the unit to make fitting possible.
No fault can be attached to the Shower Doctor for this problem and I will certainly use them again.
